General.Name: Shanghai Rongtai Health Tech
General.Description: Shanghai Rongtai Health Technology Corporation Limited engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of massage appliances in China and internationally. The company's products include neck massager, eye massager, massage backrest, massage belt, foot massager, massage cushion, hand-held massager, etc. It also provides shared massage services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
